metadata.title: CVE-2020-13936 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An attacker that is able to modify Velocity templates may execute arbitraryJava code or run arbitrary system commands with the same privileges as theaccount running the Servlet container. This applies to applications thatallow untrusted users to upload/modify velocity templates running ApacheVelocity Engine versions up to 2.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13936` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

velocity - 1.7-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: velocity package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7-6').
